title: Brooklyn Willie : 5 things to know about  The Bachelor  star Zach Shallcros bachelorette Brooklyn Willie
body_text:
Brooklyn Willie is currently in the running for Zach Shallcross' heart on The Bachelor's 27th season.
ADVERTISEMENT
RELATED LINK: 'THE BACHELOR' FRANCHISE COUPLES NOW: WHO IS STILL TOGETHER?? (PHOTOS)
Brooklyn is outspoken and brazen on The Bachelor so far this season.
Once Kaity Biggar returned to The Bachelor mansion in her pajamas following an early overnight date with Zach, Brooklyn told the cameras it "definitely looked like a walk of shame."
And Brooklyn pointed out how Anastasia Keramidas was "milking" her "injury" during the group football date.
Brooklyn also lashed out at Christina Mandrell before Christina's elimination.
"Respectfully, if I hear one-on-one [again], I might lose my mind -- not that I don't care or I'm not happy for you, but we know. We've heard about your one-on-one, we've heard that you met his family. I almost feel like it's malicious," Brooklyn snapped, later adding how she was "sick of her B-S."
While Brooklyn apparently hated hearing about Christina's one-on-one date, she's about to receive one of her own on The Bachelor.
Will Brooklyn show Zach a softer side of herself and will the pair hit it off, or is she going to continue stirring the pot?
Until viewers can watch Brooklyn and Zach's relationship unfold on The Bachelor, let's learn some information about her right now.
Below is a list of five facts Reality TV World has compiled about Brooklyn Willie.
RELATED LINK: 'THE BACHELORETTE' COUPLES NOW: WHOM DID 'THE BACHELORETTE' STARS AND THEIR BACHELOR PICKS ULTIMATELY END UP WITH?! (PHOTOS)

Brooklyn is a professional barrel racer
At just 13 years old, Brooklyn discovered she has a passion for horse barrel racing.Brooklyn was shown teaching Zach how to lasso on The Bachelor, and she was also featured in an introductory package on the show's premiere riding and feeding horses.
The bachelorette's lifelong ambition is to become a professional rodeo cowgirl while also training horses.
Brooklyn's love for horses translated into her education
Brooklyn is a graduate of Oklahoma State University.She received her Bachelor's degree in Animal Sciences in 2020.
While at Oklahoma State University, she was a member of the OKSate Rodeo Team.
The Bachelor bachelorette has a surprising second job
Brooklyn works as a lab designer for an oral surgery practice. Part of Brooklyn's job requires her to design teeth for drastic procedures.RELATED LINK: 'THE BACHELOR' COUPLES NOW: WHO DID 'THE BACHELOR' STARS AND THEIR BACHELORETTE PICKS ACTUALLY END UP MARRYING? (PHOTOS)
ADVERTISEMENT
Brooklyn wrote in January on Instagram, "Do I quit my job and let the influencers call me or do I call them?"
Brooklyn is not Oklahoma born and bred
Brooklyn is a Texas native. She was born in Mineola, TX.After graduating from high school, she moved to Stillwater, OK, to continue her education.
Brooklyn hasn't had the easiest path when it comes to relationships
ABC says Brooklyn is comfortable in her career but wants someone with a good heart, a man who is also loyal and caring.Brooklyn wants to share her life with a good man, and it wouldn't hurt if he has kind eyes and nice teeth.
According to a preview clip of the next The Bachelor episode, Zach calls Brooklyn "a sweet girl" but admits she was "holding back" several weeks into the process.
